title: kandanadu pAdAravindamE AdhAran
sahitya:
kandanadu pAdAravindamE Adhram endanukkenrumE enriruppEnE


anupallavi

  santatam nilaikkum santOSattuDan endanadu idayam irundu vandiDavE


caraNam    vEdanai Edum ennai varuttamuruttAda Adaravu tannai aLittaruL puriyavE
nAthan avanaip-pOl Edu ib-bhuvi mIdu AdalAl ippEdai shOdanai aDutta pOdu
